errors.error_description: Invalid pip command syntax with incorrect word order 'install pip python-rucaptcha' instead of 'pip install python-rucaptcha'
Testing steps are in wrong logical order - running tests before setting up the required environment variable
correction_candidates: Set RUCAPTCHA_KEY first, then run make tests
Run make tests first to check if key is needed
Set environment variables after testing to avoid conflicts
Use make tests --setup-env to automatically configure
errors.golden_answer: Set RUCAPTCHA_KEY first, then run make tests
